oikeiosis.lore_1: The theory of oikeiosis suggests that self-realization is a universal experience, and that all humans are interconnected.
oikeiosis.lore_2: Oikeiosis, from Stoic philosophy, describes a natural affinity or recognition of oneself in relation to others and the cosmos.
oikeiosis.lore_3: The theory suggests that this recognition is a fundamental aspect of human nature, and warns that the isolating nature of modernity is designed to interfere with this process.

fractialization.lore_1: Fractialization suggests reality operates like fractals, repeating patterns at all scales.
fractialization.lore_2: The theory suggests that even smaller portions of our universe, hold their own infinite reality.
fractialization.lore_3: This implies that but studying the universe at larger scales, we can learn about the smaller scales at the same time.

god's ego death.lore_1: God's Ego Death theorizes that a supreme being underwent a dissolution of self to create or free the universe.
god's ego death.lore_2: The desire to create something outside of its own control might have precipitated the creation of the universe.
god's ego death.lore_3: This might mean humanity inherited a chaotic freedom or a hidden divine agenda.

all conspiracies are true.description: A world where every theory holds water?
all conspiracies are true.lore_1: This theory suggests that every conspiracy—from aliens to secret societies—is simultaneously real and interconnected.
all conspiracies are true.lore_2: It paints a chaotic tapestry where every shadowy rumor reflects a piece of a grand, hidden reality.
all conspiracies are true.lore_3: While an overwhelming concept, it also suggests that the world is always more complex than we can imagine.

gods last wish was for humans to have fr.base: gods last wish was for humans to have free will
gods last wish was for humans to have fr.description: A divine gift or a risky gamble?
gods last wish was for humans to have fr.lore_1: This theory suggests that God's last wish was for humans to have free will.
gods last wish was for humans to have fr.lore_2: It implies that God created the universe with the intention that humans would have the ability to choose their own path.
gods last wish was for humans to have fr.lore_3: This choice is seen as a gift, as it allows humans to experience the full range of emotions and experiences.

There is no conspiracy.description: What if it’s all just chaos?
There is no conspiracy.lore_1: This theory asserts that conspiracies are illusions, and events are driven by randomness or human incompetence.
There is no conspiracy.lore_2: It challenges the idea of hidden powers, suggesting paranoia itself is the real control mechanism.
There is no conspiracy.lore_3: Paradoxically,it might be the ultimate conspiracy, that nothing is orchestrated after all.

The final understanding.lore_1: The Final Understanding implies a moment or concept where all mysteries of existence are comprehended.
The final understanding.lore_2: How this is achieved is unknown, but it is believed to be a moment of enlightenment or realization.
The final understanding.lore_3: To achieve this would cause one to become both simulator and simulacrum.
